title: Spanish for Beginners
description: Learn Spanish with Maria Garcia through 8 modules in this 25-hour course. Master essential phrases, grammar, and pronunciation. Ideal for beginners, with a rating of 4.5, and 120 students available_seats.

title: French Language Mastery
description: Join Jean Baptiste in this 22-hour course, consisting of 10 modules, to achieve French language proficiency. Develop conversational skills, vocabulary, and grammar. Rated 4.8 with 90 available_seats learners.

title: Mandarin Chinese for Business
description: Li Wei's course spans 26 hours, distributed over 8 modules, to help you navigate Chinese business communication. Enhance your language skills and cultural understanding. Rated 4.3 with 75 available_seats students.

title: Portuguese for Travelers
description: Embark on a language journey with Carla Silva, exploring Portuguese essentials for travel. Over 27 hours in 6 modules, gain practical language skills and cultural insights. Rated 4.1 with 70 enthusiastic learners.

title: Arabic Language Essentials
description: Ahmed Ali's comprehensive 24-hour course, comprising 10 modules, offers a deep dive into Arabic language fundamentals. Develop proficiency in speaking, writing, and understanding Arabic. Rated 4.5 with 85 students available_seats.

title: Korean Language Intensive Course
description: Join Kim Min-Ji on a 32-hour immersive Korean language journey with 9 modules. From Hangul to conversational fluency, this course caters to K-pop enthusiasts, travelers, and culture enthusiasts. Rated 4.5 with 105 dedicated learners.

title: German Grammar Fundamentals
description: Hans Müller's 28-hour course, divided into 6 modules, focuses on mastering German grammar. Enhance your language skills and gain confidence in written and spoken German. Rated 4.2 with 80 available_seats students.

title: Italian Conversation Practice
description: Sofia Rossi's 26-hour course, consisting of 7 modules, provides advanced beginner level conversation practice in Italian. Develop fluency and confidence in real-life situations. Rated 4.6 with 110 learners.

title: Japanese Writing Techniques
description: Takeshi Yamamoto's 20-hour course, comprising 9 modules, focuses on mastering Japanese writing techniques. Enhance your skills in hiragana, katakana, and kanji. Rated 4.4 with 100 available_seats students.

title: Russian Pronunciation Mastery
description: Natalya Ivanova's 19-hour course, divided into 7 modules, helps you achieve mastery in Russian pronunciation. Develop clear and accurate pronunciation skills. Rated 4.7 with 95 students available_seats.
